info.title: Schema of Azure Data Box events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure Data Box events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

DataBoxCopyStartedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.DataBox.CopyStarted event.

serialNumber.description: Serial Number of the device associated with the event, separated by comma delimiter in case of multiple

DataBoxCopyCompletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.DataBox.CopyCompleted event.

serialNumber.description: Serial Number of the device associated with the event, separated by comma delimiter in case of multiple

DataBoxOrderCompletedEventData.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.DataBox.OrderCompleted event.

serialNumber.description: Serial Number of the device associated with the event, separated by comma delimiter in case of multiple

StageDetail.description: Metadata related to the stage detail

time.description: The time at which the stage happened.
